https://tmrev.io/movie/314194-Chasing Cotards 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Once a successful artist, Hart is now a shadow of his former self, his world torn apart by loss. He is consumed by a haunting portrait of his deceased wife and spends every moment studying her face, unable to forget. Knowing that she was taken away from him too soon, all he wishes is that she would return to breathe life into his world once more. Chasing Cotards
